title: x/mobile/cmd/gomobile: an error happened when build gomobile bind example
body:
After update the new version of gomobile recently, I found the gomobile example has build error ($GOPATH/src/golang.org/x/mobile/example/bind/android)

gomobile version is "gomobile version +6295a61 Tue Nov 24 15:52:38 2015 +0000 (android,ios)"

And the error message is as below:

/usr/local/go/bin/gomobile: go install -p=8 -pkgdir=/Users/xxxx/go/pkg/gomobile/pkg_android_arm -tags="" -i -gcflags=-shared -ldflags=-shared golang.org/x/mobile/example/bind/hello failed: exit status 2
flag provided but not defined: -i
